entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:51 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
